thread.section_title: Rover.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rover.com | rover.com
thread.title: WEBCLIENT

author: WEBCLIENT
title: WEBCLIENT
text:
I was having problems finding a good local kennel for my dogs when I travel. A good friend recommended Rover.com...and I couldn't have been more pleased.
We found a great local sitter near out house. We were able to do a house visit with our dog, and the sitter kept us up to date on how our dog was doing the whole time we were gone. I am so glad I was able to use this service to find a great local sitter versus a kennel. She gave great attention to my dog while we were gone. We wouldn't have been able to do this without having Rover as a tool to find a sitter.
Thanks! HIGHLY RECOMMEND
